import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-information', templateUrl: './user-information.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-information.component.css'] }) export class UserInformationComponent implements OnInit { userData: FormGroup; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { this.userData = this.fb.group({ }) } ngOnInit() { } getUserID(userID: number){ } }
